title: Keyword Detection
description: Everything to get started with keyword detection
long_description: This project contains everything to get started with keyword detection using a microphone. It uses the Google Speech commands dataset to build a model to identify 35 different words. This model is suitable for all applications where speech recognition and voice control is required.
